name: Fliki
title: fliki.ai
payoff: Turn text into videos with AI
shortDescription: Fliki is a powerful AI-driven tool designed to transform text into engaging videos. It features an easy-to-use editor, lifelike AI voiceovers, and dynamic video clips. Ideal for marketers and businesses of all sizes, Fliki simplifies content creation, allowing users to produce professional videos quickly. Example use case: Marketing teams can create promotional videos without the need for extensive video production resources.
cons: Potential privacy concerns with AI usage
